product_name: Lakeshore Betty Board Stand Up Paddle Board - Women's - 11' 6"
long_description: Fast, agile and perfectly sized for women, the newly designed Betty Board has a narrower paddling profile for optimal performance on the water and ease of transportability off the water.
short_description: Fast, agile and perfectly sized for women, the newly designed Betty Board has a narrower paddling profile for optimal performance on the water and ease of transportability off the water.
